column1: EXPORTS OF ALL FORMS OF COFFEE BY EXPORTING COUNTRIES TO ALL DESTINATIONS

1/ Provisional
Note: Group sub-totals take into account the corresponding share of each type of coffee exported by countries that produce and export both Arabica and Robusta in significant
volumes. It should be noted that, where applicable, an Arabica/Robusta ratio of 50/50 has been used to convert processed coffee into Green Bean Equivalent (GBE).
